text: Nigeria has been in 20 different Africa Cup of Nations finals. Nigeria has won the cup 3 times. The first time was in 1980. They won a 2nd title in 1994 in Tunisia. Their 3rd African title was in 2013, in South Africa. == Overall record == Africa Cup of Nations record Africa Cup of Nations record Africa Cup of Nations record Africa Cup of Nations record Africa
